faq.subtitle: We ensure clarity across every engagement. If you need more detail, contact our consultancy team.

engagement.question: How do you initiate a consultancy engagement?
engagement.answer: We begin with a discovery workshop to understand objectives, constraints and stakeholders. Within five working days we present a tailored proposal with clear deliverables and timeline.

delivery.question: Will Diligion embed consultants within our team?
delivery.answer: Yes. We combine on-site and remote support depending on the engagement. Our consultants collaborate closely with your leadership and staff to accelerate adoption.

financial.question: Can you support audits or investor readiness?
financial.answer: Our financial consultants prepare financial models, valuation reports and investor decks, and align documentation with audit requirements to ensure readiness.

contracts.question: Do you work on both public and private sector contracts?
contracts.answer: Absolutely. We have extensive experience with ROP, government entities and private investors. Our frameworks comply with Omani regulations and international standards.

timeline.question: What is the typical project duration?
timeline.answer: Short diagnostic engagements run 4–6 weeks, while transformation programmes can span 6–12 months. We define milestones and governance cadence from day one.
